memberdef.name: MAKE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_TWO_COMPONENT
MAKE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_THREE_COMPONENT
MAKE_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTOR_FOUR_COMPONENT
MAKE_COMPONENT_CONSTRUCTOR_TWO_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ type(type1 val) : x(val), y(val) {} \ __device__ __host__ type(type1 val1, type1 val2) : x(val1), y(val2) {} \

memberdef.name: MAKE_COMPONENT_CONSTRUCTOR_THREE_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ type(type1 val) : x(val), y(val), z(val) {} \ __device__ __host__ type(type1 val1, type1 val2, type1 val3) : x(val1), y(val2), z(val3) {} \

memberdef.name: MAKE_COMPONENT_CONSTRUCTOR_FOUR_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ type(type1 val) : x(val), y(val), z(val), w(val) {} \ __device__ __host__ type(type1 val1, type1 val2, type1 val3, type1 val4) : x(val1), y(val2), z(val3), w(val4) {} \

memberdef.name: DECLOP_MAKE_ONE_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ static inline struct type make_##type(comp x) { \ struct type ret; \ ret.x = x; \ return ret; \ }

memberdef.name: DECLOP_MAKE_TWO_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ static inline struct type make_##type(comp x, comp y) { \ struct type ret; \ ret.x = x; \ ret.y = y; \ return ret; \ }

memberdef.name: DECLOP_MAKE_THREE_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ static inline struct type make_##type(comp x, comp y, comp z) { \ struct type ret; \ ret.x = x; \ ret.y = y; \ ret.z = z; \ return ret; \ }

memberdef.name: DECLOP_MAKE_FOUR_COMPONENT
memberdef.initializer: __device__ __host__ static inline struct type make_##type(comp x, comp y, comp z, comp w) { \ struct type ret; \ ret.x = x; \ ret.y = y; \ ret.z = z; \ ret.w = w; \ return ret; \ }

briefdescription.para: Defines the different newt vector types for HIP runtime.
